TopicTitle: Message to The B9 Aerospace pack developers

Articles.Content: Dear B9 Aerospace pack developers, Why did you remove the wings and crafts from the pack? There had been a MAJOR drawback in parts. I wanted a lot of parts to build epic planes and rockets. When you can, please bring back the old parts! Thanks- Jackaroo0505

14 hours ago, Jackaroo0505 said:

Dear B9 Aerospace pack developers, Why did you remove the wings and crafts from the pack? There had been a MAJOR drawback in parts. I wanted a lot of parts to build epic planes and rockets. When you can, please bring back the old parts! Thanks- Jackaroo0505

1) why did you not ask on their thread

2) There are B9 procedural wings.
